Parallels.ab: yōi aṣ̌āi vaōnarə = Y26.3, Y26.5, Y59.22, Y59.24.

zaraϑuštrahe spitāmahe iδa aṣ̌aōnō aṣ̌īmca frauuaṣ̌īmca yazamaide = Y6.19, Y10.21, Y13.7, VrS51.5; ~ Y4.24, Y24.5 āat̰ dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi zaraϑuštrahe spitāmahe aṣ̌aōnō frauuaṣ̌ə̄e; ~ Y3.2, Y3.22, Y3.23, Y7.3, Y7.23, Y7.24 xšnūmaine zaraϑuštrahe spitāmahe aṣ̌aōnō frauuaṣ̌əe; ~ Y68.30, NyMihr1.6, NyXwar1.6 nəmō zaraϑuštrahe spitāmahe aṣ̌aōnō frauuaṣ̌ə̄e.
kauuōiš vīštāspahe aṣ̌aōnō frauuaṣ̌īm yazamaide = Yt13.99.
isat̰.vāstrahe zaraϑuštrōiš aṣ̌aōnō frauuaṣ̌īm yazamaide = Yt13.98.
